name: Pens BOX - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Pens BOX featuring American walnut veneer on poplar plywood. Includes 3 removable trays divided into 7 compartments, holding a total of up to 21 pens. Each tray is covered with SC leather from Poltrona Frau, and the base is made of nubuk velvety leather from Poltrona Frau, available in four color combinations.
